name: More or less a pet apocalypse
name_original: More or less a pet apocalypse
description:
BTP game jam game, this is a very short game

how does it fit the theme you might ask?

the more kills the lower your sanity goes, the lower your sanity the lower your damage is, and if your sanity gets to zero you die.

I made everything myself but the font.

I hope you enjoy the silly concept of a pet apocalypse.
